bug.author: vxgu86

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/vxgu86>@vxgu86</denchmark-link> can you tell us more about the circumstances in which this happened? Just in case it's a function of being in CV mode, colliding with a certain thing, etc

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/vxgu86>@vxgu86</denchmark-link> Please feel free to open a new issue if you still have this problem, and include the following
Make sure to write all reproduction steps Include full error message in text form Search issues for error message before filing issue Attach screenshot if applicable Include code to run if applicable
Thanks!
